creator: m@owca.info
summary: [checks] Ignore "Apostrophes in Android DTDs need escaping"

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
Pontoon currently doesn't allow saving translations that contain apostrophes in Firefox for Android DTDs, because they yield compare-locales error.

That's actually not necessary, because Pontoon takes care of escaping when serializing translations back to a file. So we should ignore the check.

This is a regression from bug 1458343.
